CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Hagop,
As we discussed, here are the details of the clients who will be leasing vehicles from us:

Real Emirates:
 2 Farizon vans for last-mile delivery
1 Sany 3-ton truck

EVS:
1 Farizon van for home service for EV cars

Kevin Chalhoub:
* 1 NIO ET5 for personal use (to be driven by their driver)

Best regards,

Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental
+971 58 541 4500
